salt-lake-city.neighborhoods: Downtown, Sugar House, The Avenues, Capitol Hill, Liberty Wells
salt-lake-city.meetingHighlights: Largest AA community in the state with diverse neighborhood meetings, strong newcomer programs, and frequent speaker events.
salt-lake-city.transitInfo: UTA TRAX light rail and bus network serve the metro; Salt Lake City International Airport (SLC) offers national flights.

provo.meetingHighlights: University-influenced meetings with many student-friendly schedules and strong lunchtime and evening groups.
provo.transitInfo: UVX and local bus services connect Provo and Orem; Provo Municipal Airport and Salt Lake City airport for wider travel.

ogden.neighborhoods: Downtown, 25th Street, Weber State area, East Bench
ogden.meetingHighlights: Neighborhood and downtown meetings with outdoor-recreation community overlap; steady evening attendance.
ogden.transitInfo: UTA bus service and FrontRunner commuter rail nearby; regional highway access to Salt Lake City.

st-george.neighborhoods: Downtown, Sun River, Red Cliffs, Bloomington
st-george.meetingHighlights: Growing fellowship with many newcomer-friendly and seasonal meetings serving the resort and retirement communities.
st-george.transitInfo: SunTran and regional bus services; St. George Regional Airport for regional flights.

orem.neighborhoods: Downtown Orem, Utah Valley University area, Riverbottom
orem.meetingHighlights: Suburban meetings with strong family and commuter attendance and frequent evening options.
orem.transitInfo: UVX and local bus services; convenient driving links to Provo and Salt Lake City.

west-valley-city.areaDescription: West Valley City (Salt Lake City western suburbs)

intergroup.name: Salt Lake Area Intergroup (serves West Valley)

west-valley-city.meetingHighlights: Diverse suburban meetings with Spanish-language options; active evening groups serving the western Salt Lake valley.
west-valley-city.transitInfo: UTA bus and TRAX connections to Salt Lake City; Salt Lake City International Airport (SLC) nearby.
